h1.title: Convert SVG to PNG Online
h1.description: Free and fast SVG to PNG converter with crisp rasterization and transparency support. Works instantly on any device — no signup required.

description:
Turn your SVG to PNG in seconds. This free online converter rasterizes your vector graphics into high-quality PNG images while preserving transparency for clean edges on any background.

Perfect for favicons, app assets, social images, and web graphics. We optimize output for a strong balance of clarity and file size.

converter.title: SVG to PNG Converter
converter.description: Convert SVG vector graphics to PNG raster format with high quality and fast processing.

h2.title: Why Convert SVG to PNG?
h2.description:
• Universal compatibility: PNG displays everywhere, no SVG support required.
  • Transparency: Preserve alpha for overlays and UI elements.
  • Performance: Smaller, cacheable bitmaps for production.

h2.title: How to Convert SVG to PNG Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload SVG and select your file.
  2. Wait for rasterization and optimization.
  3. Click Download PNG to save your image.

Defaults keep transparency and balanced compression.

h2.title: Best Practices for Crisp Output
h2.description:
• Use a square artboard with padding to avoid clipping at edges.
  • Convert text to outlines; embed fonts and images.
  • Avoid overly thin strokes for small icons (≥1px at target size).
  • Export larger (e.g., 512–1024 px) if you’ll downscale later.

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Missing fonts/filters: Inline assets and convert text to outlines.
  • Jagged edges: Increase target size or scale, then downsample.
  • Solid background: Ensure background is set to transparent in options.
  • Upload fails: Ensure valid SVG and ≤16 MB.

faq.question: Is this SVG to PNG converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, it’s completely free with no watermarks or hidden charges.

faq.question: Does PNG preserve transparency?
faq.answer: Yes. PNG supports alpha transparency and we preserve it by default.

faq.question: Can I choose the output size?
faq.answer: By default we use the SVG viewBox. You can set width/height or a scale factor in advanced options if supported.

faq.question: What file size limits apply?
faq.answer: You can upload SVG files up to 16 MB.

faq.question: Why does my PNG look different from the SVG?
faq.answer: External fonts, filters, or linked assets can render differently when rasterized. Convert text to outlines and inline assets for consistent results.

note: SVGs are rasterized during conversion. For predictable results, outline text and embed any external assets.
